properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh yesu nee prema entho mahaneeyamu aakaasha thaara parvatha samudramula kanna goppadi{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}ఓ యేసు నీ ప్రేమ ఎంతో మహానీయము ఆకాశతార పర్వత సముద్రములకన్న గొప్పది{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Agamya aanandame hrudayamu nindenu prabhuni kaaryamulu gambheera mainavi prati udaya saayantramulu stutiki yogyamulu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sankata samayamulo saaga lekunnamu daya choopu naa meeda ani nenu morra pettagaa vintinantivi naa moraku munde thoda nundu nantivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maranaandha kaarampu loya ne sancharinchina niranthara mesu Naadu kaapariyai karamunitchi nannu gaayuchu nadupu karuna gala prabhuvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Koduva lenni yunna bhaya padanu ne nepudu pachika bayalulo parunda jeyunu bhojana jalamulatho thrupti parachuchu naatho nundu nesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni gruhamulo sadaa stutinchedanu. sampoorna hrudayamutho sadaa bhajinchedanu stuti prashamsalaku Yogyudesu Halleluya aamen .{/lang-eng}
